long_description: The Mountainsmith Kit Cube camera case converts your bag or pack into a padded, protective camera hauler for commuting, travel and backcountry adventures. Access the main compartment via a lightning-fast storm collar with a drawstring; it contains soft, customizable dividers to secure a DLSR body, telephoto lens and accessories. Yellow lining increases visibility. The Mountainsmith Kit Cube camera case fits the Mountainsmith All Terrain and MountainLight series packs (sold separately).
short_description: The Mountainsmith Kit Cube camera case converts your bag or pack into a padded, protective camera hauler for commuting, travel and backcountry adventures.
